name: NOMINA
query:
SELECT
	`tabSalary Slip`.cedula_o_pasaporte AS `CEDULA`,
	`tabSalary Slip`.posting_date AS "FECHA:Date:70",
	`tabSalary Slip`.employee_name AS "NOMBRE:Read Only:100",
	
	IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * `tabSalary Slip`.salario_base,`tabSalary Slip`.salario_base) AS `Salario Base:Float:100`,

	`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio AS "tasa",

	IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * `tabSalary Slip`.salario_base / 2 ,MAX(IF (salary_component = 'Salario Quincenal',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))
	AS `Salario Quincena:Float:100`,
	
	IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * 
	SUM(CASE WHEN 
	salary_component = 'US Retroactivo' OR	
	salary_component = 'US Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables Actual Quincena' OR
	salary_component = 'US Otros Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'US Otros Ingresos Extraordinarios No cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'US Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables Quincena Anterior' OR
	salary_component = 'US Ingreso Extrordinarios Pagados Quincena Anterior' OR
	salary_component = 'US Ingresos Extraordinarios No Cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'US Cesantía' OR
	salary_component = 'US Vacaciones' OR
	salary_component = 'US Pre-aviso' OR
	salary_component = 'US Horas Extras Domingos y Feriados' OR
	salary_component = 'US Horas Extras Nocturnas' OR
	salary_component = 'US Horas Extras Diurnas' OR
	salary_component = 'US Bonificacion' OR
	salary_component = 'US Bonos por Desempeño' OR
	salary_component = 'US Comisiones' OR
	salary_component = 'US Salario de Navidad'
	THEN
	`tabSalary Detail`.amount
	ELSE
	0
	END
	),
	SUM(CASE WHEN 
	salary_component = 'Retroactivo' OR	
	salary_component = 'Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables Actual Quincena' OR
	salary_component = 'Otros Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'Otros Ingresos Extraordinarios No cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'Ingresos Extraordinarios Cotizables Quincena Anterior' OR
	salary_component = 'Ingreso Extrordinarios Pagados Quincena Anterior' OR
	salary_component = 'Ingresos Extraordinarios No Cotizables' OR
	salary_component = 'Cesantía' OR
	salary_component = 'Vacaciones' OR
	salary_component = 'Pre-aviso' OR
	salary_component = 'Horas Extras Domingos y Feriados' OR
	salary_component = 'Horas Extras Nocturnas' OR
	salary_component = 'Horas Extras Diurnas' OR
	salary_component = 'Bonificacion' OR
	salary_component = 'Bonos por Desempeño' OR
	salary_component = 'Comisiones' OR
	salary_component = 'Salario de Navidad'
	THEN
	`tabSalary Detail`.amount
	ELSE
	0
	END
	)
	) AS `Otros Ingresos:Float:100`,

	IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * ROUND(MAX(IF (salary_component = 'US Seguro Familiar de Salud(01)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
			(IF (salary_component = 'US Seguro Familiar de Salud(02)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))),2),MAX(IF (salary_component = 'Seguro Familiar de Salud(01)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
		(IF (salary_component = 'Seguro Familiar de Salud(02)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))))
	 AS `SFS empleado:Float:100`,

	IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * ROUND(MAX(IF (salary_component = 'US Administracion de Fondos de Pensiones(01)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
			(IF (salary_component = 'US Administracion de Fondo de Pensiones(02)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))),2), MAX(IF (salary_component = 'Administracion de Fondos de Pensiones(01)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
		(IF (salary_component = 'Administracion de Fondos de Pensiones(02)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))))
	 AS `AFP empleado:Float:100`,

	IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * ROUND(MAX(IF (salary_component = 'US Impuesto Sobre la Renta(01)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
			(IF (salary_component = 'US Impuesto Sobre la Renta(02)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
				(IF (salary_component = 'US Impuesto Sobre la Renta(03)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
					(IF (salary_component = 'US Impuesto Sobre la Renta(04)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))))))),2), ROUND(MAX(IF (salary_component = 'Impuesto Sobre la Renta(01)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
							(IF (salary_component = 'Impuesto Sobre la Renta(02)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
								(IF (salary_component = 'Impuesto Sobre la Renta(03)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,
									(IF (salary_component = 'Impuesto Sobre la Renta(04)',`tabSalary Detail`.amount,"0")))))))),2))
	 AS `ISR:Float:100`,
	
	 IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * 
	 	SUM(
	 		CASE WHEN 
	 		salary_component = 'US Seguro Médico Complementario' OR		
			salary_component = 'US Prestamos para estudios' OR
			salary_component = 'US Seguro Básico Dependiente' OR
		 	salary_component = 'US Deducciones Extraordinarias' OR
		 	salary_component = 'US Aporte voluntario AFP'
	 		THEN
	 			`tabSalary Detail`.amount
	 		ELSE
	 			0
	 		END
	 		),
	 	SUM(CASE WHEN 
	 		salary_component = 'Seguro Médico Complementario' OR		
	 		salary_component = 'Prestamos para estudios' OR		
	 		salary_component = 'Deduccion de prestamos' OR		
			salary_component = 'Seguro Básico Dependiente' OR
		 	salary_component = 'Deducciones Extraordinarias' OR
		 	salary_component = 'Aporte Voluntario AFP'
	 		THEN
	 		`tabSalary Detail`.amount
	 		ELSE
	 			0
	 		END
	 		)
	 )
	 AS `DEDUCCIONES:Float:100`,

	IF (`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio != 0,`tabSalary Slip`.tasa_de_cambio * `tabSalary Slip`.net_pay,`tabSalary Slip`.net_pay)
	 AS "NETO A PAGAR:Float:100"
	
	FROM
	((`tabSalary Slip`
	INNER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` ON `tabSalary Slip`. NAME = `tabSalary Detail`.parent)
	INNER JOIN tabEmployee ON `tabSalary Slip`.employee = tabEmployee. NAME)
WHERE
`tabSalary Detail`.parenttype = "Salary Slip"
AND `tabSalary Detail`.parent = `tabSalary Slip`.`name`
AND `tabSalary Slip`.`status` != "Cancelled"
AND `tabSalary Slip`.start_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
AND `tabSalary Slip`.company = %(company)s
GROUP BY
	`tabSalary Detail`.parent
ORDER BY
	`tabSalary Slip`.employee_name
